name: Touhou: The Embezzlement of the Icy Debiru (GoldoShaino)
name_original: Touhou: The Embezzlement of the Icy Debiru (GoldoShaino)
description:
The Strongest Fairy™ did it again!

This time Cirno embezzled retirement money from the Fairy Trust Fund so the bankers decide to send a fairy clone army to catch her.

Fight the clones of the other fairies using snowballs!

Both keyboard+mouse and controllers (gameplay only) should work.

WASD and Arrows: Movement

Mouse: Point to where you want to shoot

LeftMouse Button: Shoot

Left Stick and D-PAD: Movement

Right Stick: Shooting and aiming

The game is still in active development and will be completely free for the foreseeable future
